input.sentences: he had his morning coffee to prepare for his ride .
he looked over the mountain to see the view .
the front entrance to the church .
good friends posing for a photo .
riding through the city to get to the mountain .
output.sentences: He woke up early in the morning to eat breakfast and drink coffee for the upcoming bike ride.
They got to the top of the mountain and it had a beautiful view.
They drove by the entrance to the church with the bells.
All the friends gathered for a photograph.
They rode up through the mountains and came down in the city.
